    • Get all physiologies for a set of taxa

Get physiologies

Source: R/getPhysiologies.R
getPhysiologies.Rd

getPhysiologies get all physiology annotations for one or more taxa.

getPhysiologies(x, phys = physiologies(), taxid.type = "Taxon_name")

Arguments

x

A valid NCBI ID or taxon name

phys

A list of dataframes with physiologies imported with the physiologies function. If not specified, all physiologies will be imported.

taxid.type

The type of taxid. Valid options: Taxon_name or NCBI_ID. Default is Taxon_name.

Value

A list of physiologies per taxa.

Examples


phys <- physiologies()
#> Importing acetate producing (numeric)
#> Finished acetate producing
#> Importing aerophilicity (logical)
#> Finished aerophilicity
#> Importing animal pathogen (logical)
#> Dropped 1 rows with missing Attribute_value from animal pathogen
#> Importing antimicrobial resistance (logical)
#> Finished antimicrobial resistance
#> Importing antimicrobial sensitivity (logical)
#> Finished antimicrobial sensitivity
#> Importing arrangement (logical)
#> Finished arrangement
#> Importing biofilm forming (logical)
#> Finished biofilm forming
#> Importing butyrate producing (numeric)
#> Finished butyrate producing
#> Importing COGEM pathogenicity rating (logical)
#> Finished COGEM pathogenicity rating
#> Importing disease association (logical)
#> Finished disease association
#> Importing extreme environment (logical)
#> Finished extreme environment
#> Importing gram stain (logical)
#> Finished gram stain
#> Importing growth medium (logical)
#> Finished growth medium
#> Importing growth temperature (numeric)
#> Finished growth temperature
#> Importing habitat (logical)
#> Finished habitat
#> Importing health associated (logical)
#> Finished health associated
#> Importing hydrogen gas producing (numeric)
#> Finished hydrogen gas producing
#> Importing isolation site (logical)
#> Finished isolation site
#> Importing lactate producing (numeric)
#> Finished lactate producing
#> Importing length (range)
#> Finished length
#> Importing mutation rate per site per generation (numeric)
#> Finished mutation rate per site per generation
#> Importing mutation rates per site per year (numeric)
#> Finished mutation rates per site per year
#> Importing optimal ph (numeric)
#> Finished optimal ph
#> Importing plant pathogenicity (logical)
#> Finished plant pathogenicity
#> Importing shape (logical)
#> Finished shape
#> Importing spore shape (logical)
#> Finished spore shape
#> Importing width (range)
#> Finished width
#> Importing genome size (numeric)
#> Dropped 5 rows with missing Attribute_value from genome size
#> Importing coding genes (numeric)
#> Finished coding genes
#> Importing sphingolipid producing (logical)
#> Finished sphingolipid producing

taxa_names <- c('Escherichia coli', 'Staphylococcus aureus')
taxa_ids <- c('562', '1280')

phys_names <- getPhysiologies(taxa_names, phys)
phys_ids <- getPhysiologies(taxa_ids, phys, 'NCBI_ID')
